title: Green Mountain Power (GMP) has Selected Varasset Enterprise Software
text: Green Mountain Power (GMP) has Selected Varasset Enterprise Software For Asset Management and Pole Joint Use RUTLAND, VT, October 24,   GMP required a reliable, joint-use asset management software solution with workflow automation and notification functions to support their processes and timelines for joint use and third-party attachment programs. After thoroughly researching the available solutions, GMP selected Varasset due to its ability to conform to GMP's unique workflows and regulatory requirements, the ability to interface with internal GMP systems, and Varasset's successful utility industry track record. GMP's primary project goals include: - Accurately tracking and managing poles and other assets - Collaborating with pole attachers (e.g., cable, telco and municipal entities) - Automating the attacher permit process through the Varasset Web Portal - Integrating with existing systems, including their Esri GIS - Supporting the attachment billing process - Automating and streamlining workflows About Green Mountain Power Green Mountain Power serves approximately 265,000 residential and business customers in Vermont and has a vision to be the best small company in America by empowering customers to save money and move to clean energy sources. About Varasset Implemented in electric, cable and telco utilities across the US, Varasset adapts to each utility's unique business processes. Core Varasset functionality includes: - Asset management
